metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11102 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The ReadOneJNGImage function in coders/png.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash)during JNG reading via a zero-length color_image data structure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11102` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.2
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.2
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.2
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.2
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.23-1ubuntu0.2').
